headline: 3 Mid-Cap Stocks We Keep Off Our Radar
summary: Mid-cap stocks have the best odds of scaling into $100 billion corporations thanks to their tested business models and large addressable markets. But the many opportunities in front of them attract significant competition, spanning from industry behemoths with seemingly infinite resources to small, nimble players with chips on their shoulders.

raw.headline: 3 Mid-Cap Stocks We Keep Off Our Radar
raw.summary: Mid-cap stocks have the best odds of scaling into $100 billion corporations thanks to their tested business models and large addressable markets. But the many opportunities in front of them attract significant competition, spanning from industry behemoths with seemingly infinite resources to small, nimble players with chips on their shoulders.

headline: Mortgage rates hit lowest level in nearly 4 years, but homebuyers are still stuck on the sidelines
summary: Mortgage rates dropped to the lowest level since 2022 last week, but demand from homebuyers declined as well, as they continue to struggle with affordability.

raw.headline: Mortgage rates hit lowest level in nearly 4 years, but homebuyers are still stuck on the sidelines
raw.summary: Mortgage rates dropped to the lowest level since 2022 last week, but demand from homebuyers declined as well, as they continue to struggle with affordability.

headline: Lowe's CEO says the housing market is under pressure, even as the retailer's sales jump more than 10%
summary: Lowe's posted more than 10% sales growth in the fourth quarter at a time when housing turnover and home improvement demand are slow.
